ing: 1/4 teaspoon adobo sauce from canned chilies, or to taste
des: "This is a great guacamole recipe which is very easy to customize to your own tastes. The addition of lime and chipotle puts a spin on this simple recipe and separate it from the pack."
ins: Mash together cubed avocado, lime juice, sour cream, salsa, and adobo sauce in a bowl until blended. Season with salt and pepper.
